column1: Little Goat Diner////I'm a fan with the bagel and lox breakfast
column2: which I didn't have.  My pancakes were huge and just too sweet.  I wouldn't order them again.  The breakfast menu is very unusual
column4: but quite inventive.  The bakery is the best
column5: as was the service....it was fun
column6: I just ordered the wrong dish.
